5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Umar reported that when the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) sat for tashahhud he placed his left hand on his left knee. and his right hand on his right knee. and he raised his right finger, which is next to the thumb, making supplication in this way, and he stretched his left hand on his left knee

chapter.ara-name: باب صِفَةِ الْجُلُوسِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ وَكَيْفِيَّةِ وَضْعِ الْيَدَيْنِ عَلَى الْفَخِذَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: The description of the sitting during the prayer, and how the hands are to be placed on the thighs
